Factsheet

Developer:
Diego Giacomelli
Based in Porto Alegre - Brazil
Release date:
Open beta (Android) - 12 Aug, 2020
Platforms:
Android
Website:
diegogiacomelli.com.br/games/puzzimals
Regular Price:
Free

Description

Cute, but challenging! Don't let the cute look or super fun animations fool you, Puzzimals is a cube-matching game challenging you to match identical tiles in 100 levels of thought-provoking puzzles in a world map. Packed with features and creative puzzles you can combine cubes of ice, wild cards, bombs and so much more! Each level unlocks and increases in difficulty and offers an almost infinite number of combos. Fans of casual puzzle games will enjoy the crisp, colorful graphics featuring cute animals and the compelling music offers great relaxation.

History

Puzzimals is in open beta

Developed by indie game dev Diego Giacomelli from Porto Alegre (RS), Puzzimals is in open beta. To be final released soon, the puzzle game will initially be launched for Android, but iOS is also in the plans.

Play the beta

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.diegogiacomelli.puzzimals

Features

  • 100 levels
  • Creative puzzles
  • Almost infinite combos
  • Cute animals
